thi-ap1:5.3: Sattaratanamahesī → sattaratanassa mahesī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap1:6.1: Idha sañcitakusalā → tattha sañcitaṃ kusalaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); idha sañcitā kusalaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap1:18.2: Tammūlaṃ sāsane khamaṃ → tammūlaṃ sā ca sāsane khanti (bj, mr); taṃ mūlaṃ sā ca sāsane khanti (pts-vp-pli1)
